title: SOLD: 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplements - Bobby Wallace HOF Rookie BGS 2.5
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplements - Bobby Wallace HOF Rookie BGS 2.5
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is an extremely rare 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement picturing HOF'er, Bobby Wallace and having been graded a BGS 2.5 by the strict graders at Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. I believe this to be the finest example in existence. Please review scan for condition details and please note that the back is clean. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
BUMP due to final price reduction.
